description: Bhel puri is a feast of textures and punchy flavours, a bowl of delicious Indian street food goodness.
name: Bhel Puri Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: 1 medium red onion, peeled and diced

recipeInstructions.text: Place the potatoes in a large pan of boiling water and cook for 10 minutes and drain well.

Place the tamarind paste, caster sugar, ground ginger, cumin and a quarter of the green chilli in a blender with a tablespoon of water and blitz to a chutney consistency, adding more water if necessary.
Toss the potato in a bowl with the red onion, tomatoes, coriander, chopped chilli and pomegranate seeds. Add the tamarind chutney and mango chutney and toss to coat. Stir in the Bombay mix and serve.
